data.name: ID_Armor_Ghost_Black
data.value: 'The spooky feel won't go away even after washing it over ten times.'

data.name: ID_Armor_Mantle_Ninja
data.value: 'Are you going to be a NINJA WARRIOR ?!!'

data.name: ID_Belt_HeroesRage
data.value: 'To be able to restrain your rage in battle is an important step to become a master fighter.'

data.name: ID_Boots_IronCoatedLeather
data.value: 'A kick with those boots shall hurt.'

data.name: ID_Boots_UndeadHunter
data.value: How stinky! They really should get cleaned ...

data.name: ID_Bow_Ballista_Strong
data.value: 'Just the perfect ranged weapon for a warrior.'

data.name: ID_Bow_RudrasEnhancedDemon
data.value: 'The sinew of the bow has been replaced by the hair of demons. Deadly!'

data.name: ID_Cloak_Battle
data.value: 'This one has been used in many battles.'

data.name: ID_Cloak_Cape_DemonMarquess
data.value: 'A tale tells that in the old times parts of Hyrule's royal family were abducted and transformed into true demons.'

data.name: ID_Cloak_Coat_Skeleton
data.value: 'U-aakh, it's smelling like a rotten skeleton!'

data.name: ID_Cloak_Coat_SlimyGhost
data.value: 'Green slime keeps coming out. One day it will fill all earth!'

data.name: ID_Cloak_Muffler_Demon
data.value: 'Watch out! It may turn your mind evil~'

data.name: ID_Food_Burrito_Ghost
data.value: 'Yummy! Too bad that it's hard to eat.'

data.name: ID_Gloves_Gauntlets_StrongPush
data.value: 'It allows the wearer to easily break any wall.'

data.name: ID_Head_DemonStrawHat
data.value: 'Oh dear! It's surrounded by an evil aura.'

data.name: ID_Head_FakeHeavenRing
data.value: 'Ghost, zombies, demons and so on are all bullshit. When do you finally get that they don't exist? Trust me on that one.'

data.name: ID_Head_PooPoo
data.value: 'The horrible smell makes 'em hesitate to attack you.'

data.name: ID_Key_TiaWoods_StoneIsland
data.value: 'Opens the path leading to the Stone Tombs in the Tia Woods.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Apple_Big_Green
data.value: 'From a tree in the Hyrule Gardens.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Apple_Small_Red
data.value: 'One bite will make you smile all day. :)'

data.name: ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_1
data.value: An old story tells that there once existed a sword, which captured the forces of the great winds. ...

data.name: ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_2
data.value: ... A sword that allowed its wielder to master the powers that helped to form the very lands of Hyrule. It's name was ...

data.name: ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_3
data.value: ... the Wind Sword of Hyrule. The protectors of time and space were entrusted to keep the sword hidden of the evils that have been foreseen to come. ...

data.name: ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_4
data.value: ... And those times came, the great evil in form of Ganon emerged to destroy all we loved. His avaricious mind wanted almost nothing else than to get his hands on the mighty sword. ...

data.name: ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_5
data.value: ... Using the powers of the sword he could shape Hyrule as he wishes. And it almost came that way ...

data.name: ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_6
data.value: ... Today we call it the Legend of the Winds, but I tell you it is far from a legend. Thunder and rain were moaning for weeks after Ganondorf has found the Temple of Time. ...

data.name: ID_Misc_BrokenWindSword_Part_7
data.value: ... But as Ganondorf reached for the sword, a great light, brighter than anything you've seen before, filled the temple. Din herself, the goddess of power, broke the sword into seven pieces and spread them all over Hyrule. The story ends by presaging that one day a young boy will come and reforge the mighty Wind Sword of Hyrule to fight the evils. One day.

data.name: ID_Misc_Clover_FourLeaf
data.value: 'It is said that Four Leaf Clovers can be used to create lucky charms!'

data.name: ID_Misc_Crystal_DarkMatter
data.value: 'It consists of a strange material that usually can't be found in Hyrule.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Crystal_Fragment_Skeletal
data.value: 'An old story tells that the Skeleton Crystals were each shattered into three crystal fragments. Could it be?'

data.name: ID_Misc_DeadFish
data.value: 'This fish has been thrown around a lot.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Doll_Yoyo
data.value: 'Lovely toy for any child. Made in Hyrule.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Dye_Black
data.value: 'Some people like to wear black clothes. This dye is just perfect for them.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Fabric
data.value: 'It has a spooky feel to it.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Key_SmallUniversalWind
data.value: 'By the powers of the winds, be open!

data.name: ID_Misc_Leaf_Great
data.value: 'The essence of these leaves can easily be extracted.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Leaf_Small_Black
data.value: 'Can be used to create Black Dye.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Ore_Iron
data.value: 'To create Iron combine three units of Iron Ore.'

data.name: ID_Misc_RudrasSoulStone
data.value: 'A part of Rudra's soul has been captured in this crystal stone.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Silk_Expensive
data.value: 'A rumour says that this silk comes from the golden realm .'

data.name: ID_Misc_SkeletonBone
data.value: A leg bone of a skeleton.

data.name: ID_Misc_SkeletonBonePowder
data.value: 'This fine powder is of great use for any alchemist.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Tablet_OfWisdom
data.value: 'Studying the ancient words may uncover many secrets.'

data.name: ID_Necklace_LostFamily
data.value: 'This necklace has been doomed lost by the Tia Woods family.'

data.name: ID_Necklace_SmallLucky
data.value: 'Buy it and the luck of the world shall all be yours.'

data.name: ID_Necklace_TrueBloodCore
data.value: 'Stores the blood of a fallen warrior.'

data.name: ID_OffhandDagger
data.value: 'Some fighters prefer to give up defense for pure brutal power.'

data.name: ID_OldShirt
data.value: It really needs a wash up!

data.name: ID_PhaseShifting
data.value: 'It seems to be partially shifted out from our realm of existence. How can this be.. ?'

data.name: ID_Potion_BoneHardening
data.value: 'Don't forget that even hardened bones can break.'

data.name: ID_Potion_GhostlyShroom
data.value: 'You may feel strange after drinking it!'

data.name: ID_Quest_StoneTempleSecretMap
data.value: Shows every single secret of the family tombs of the local rulers. Sadly it's encoded.

data.name: ID_Quest_TiaWoodsFamilyPortrait
data.value: 'This painting has only got a sentimental value.'

data.name: ID_Quest_TiaWoods_BrokenYoyoDoll
data.value: 'This doll needs to be repaired or it could actually hurt the children that play with it.'

data.name: ID_Quest_TiaWoods_MurderLetter
data.value: 'The letter has been sealed carefully. Do you really want to open it?'

data.name: ID_Relic_BombBag_Tinted
data.value: 'I'd rather not use it to store bombs. Or do you want to explode?'

data.name: ID_Relic_Crystal_Skeletal
data.value: 'Once upon a time there was a force that kept the balance in place. It created the Skeletal Crystals to protect the citizen of Hyrule from the dangers of the Skeleton Realm. ... Until the crystals were scattered over the lands. Since then skeletons started again to appear in all parts of Hyrule.

data.name: ID_Ring_ArrowInfusingBracelets
data.value: 'The power of the bracelets infuses your arrows.'

data.name: ID_Ring_Copper
data.value: 'Its simple look can easily fool one.'

data.name: ID_Ring_KanesLooter
data.value: 'Has been stolen and abused by demons. Poor Kane!'

data.name: ID_Ring_PowerBracelets
data.value: 'You feel the power flow through your veins.'

data.name: ID_Staff_DemonSkull
data.value: 'The demonic power still flows through the staff.'

data.name: ID_Staff_Iron
data.value: 'Warriors may find it useful. Good to crush bones.'

data.name: ID_Staff_Ruby
data.value: 'I wonder why it is so cheap ... ?!'

data.name: ID_Staff_Ward_KokirianNovice
data.value: 'You won't do many wonders with this one. But it'll get you started.'

data.name: ID_Sword_Demonic
data.value: 'Only a demon can unleash the true power of this weapon.'

data.name: ID_Sword_Demonic_Enhanced
data.value: 'Only a demon can unleash the true power of this weapon. But it has been enhanced to make it easier to wield.'

data.name: ID_Sword_FuryOfTheWarrior
data.value: "Actually, only exalted guardians of the Hyrule Temple are allowed to use it."

data.name: ID_WindOfHyrule
data.value: The legend became true.. it changes shape in the bottle.

data.name: ID_Tainted_ByRudra
data.value: 'The touch of Rudra has tainted this item.'

data.name: ID_Trinket_CursedLuck
data.value: 'The curse may be lifted with the power of a Four Leaf Clover.'

data.name: ID_Trinket_CursedLuck_Cleansed
data.value: 'The power of a four leaf clove has cleansed the charm.'

data.name: ID_Trinket_Lantern_Iron
data.value: 'The demon hunters of Hyrule used to identify themself by having such an iron lantern.'

data.name: ID_Trinket_OfLight
data.value: 'The Light shall be with you.' - The Brotherhood

data.name: ID_Trinket_RudrasHeart
data.value: 'It's just one of many. He'll simply extract a new one from one of his followers.'

data.name: ID_Weapon_Dagger_QuickStrikeCombat
data.value: 'As an assassin you'll have to adjust your fight-style.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Buff_ManaDeliciousGem
data.value: 'Not only are they terribly addicting, but they also have additional uses.'

data.name: ID_Misc_BloodiedGoronShackleBall
data.value: 'These Gorons seem to have changed ... or how can you explain this ..?'

data.name: ID_Misc_Skull_Goron
data.value: 'These Gorons are using skulls of their own kind in bloody rituals.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Steel_BrokenGoronPiece
data.value: 'Why did they break the precious steel ..?'

data.name: ID_Shield_DarkMatter
data.value: 'It would guard you even against rock monsters!'

data.name: ID_Misc_Steel_Goron
data.value: 'Additional refinement is required for it to have any magical properties.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Feather_Chicken_White
data.value: 'It's unusually soft for a chicken feather.'

data.name: ID_Ring_GoronPower
data.value: 'It proves that the wearer has amazing powers.'

data.name: ID_Armor_StoneSpirit
data.value: 'A life-force tries to emerge from the stone.'

data.name: ID_Key_RouteOfDin_Goron
data.value: 'It just might open one of those black blocks.'

data.name: ID_Belt_GirdleOfArnold
data.value: His second last words were: 'Don't let them get da girdle!'

data.name: ID_Ring_BloodMyth
data.value: 'A myth tells that each year a young virgin is taken from Hyrule Town to be sacrificed in order to appease the blood gods.'

data.name: ID_Food_MilkPack_Demon
data.value: 'Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer. But I admit that this one here is different.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Gold_Goron
data.value: 'This gold ore has been mined in the Death Mountains near Goronia.'

data.name: ID_Potion_Buff_BloodCourage
data.value: 'I didn't expect the kinda Spanish inquisition.' ...

data.name: ID_Weapon_Dagger_GoronAssassination
data.value: 'Nowhere, absolutely nowhere, has there ever been a hint, not even a whisper, that a Goron was involved in the assassination of our beloved king.'

data.name: ID_GemFire
data.value: 'Fire gems empower an item with the greatness of the goddess Din.'

data.name: ID_GemWater
data.value: 'Water gems impart divine wisdom upon an item and its holder.'

data.name: ID_GemNature
data.value: 'Nature gems inherit the magic of life itself to an item.'

data.name: ID_GemLight
data.value: 'Light gems imbue an item with the sacred essence of the goddesses.'

data.name: ID_GemPrismatic
data.value: 'Fire, Water, Shadow, Light and Nature I call you forth to aid me in my deeds.'

data.name: ID_GemShadow
data.value: 'Shadow gems envelop an item with the mystical powers of the underworld.'

data.name: ID_Misc_GemPouch
data.value: 'Be aware that the other gems inside the pouch will disappear once you've chosen to take out a gem.'

data.name: ID_Boots_Shackles_Blood
data.value: 'You'll leave a trace of blood on the ground if you wear those shackles.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Card_LuckyGoron
data.value: 'Combine an Ace, a Two and a Three to create a card set.'

data.name: ID_Relic_CardSet_LuckyGoron
data.value: 'Don't waste all your rubies even when you think that you have all the luck of the world.'

data.name: ID_SongScroll_TimeWarp
data.value: Up.. Down.. Left.. Right.. Up.. Down..

data.name: ID_Sword_Protector
data.value: 'If you find the right balance between offense and defense, then you will come out victorious even in the most uneven battle.'

data.name: ID_Gloves_NinjaExtraction
data.value: 'Extracting all useful information before finishing the job is preferred.'

data.name: ID_Misc_Mucus_Octorok
data.value: 'Those are sticky! Please clean your hands ...'

data.name: ID_Relic_OctorokStone
data.value: 'This stone has something unusual to it. Could it be the mucus that is covering it ..?'

data.name: ID_Potion_Buff_OctorokMucus
data.value: 'Risk: Might clog the blood flow in your body.'

data.name: ID_GemLight_Skeleton
data.value: 'Light gems attract and capture the souls of the fallen.'

data.name: ID_Armor_Robe_Silk
data.value: 'You don't have to feel strange for wearing a pink robe.. !'

data.name: ID_Ring_ConcentratedEnergy
data.value: 'The energy may unload at any time.'

data.name: ID_Relic_FreyasChant
data.value: 'Watch out! The agglomerated magic stored in this relic might discharge at any time.'

data.name: ID_Trinket_FuryCompass
data.value: 'This one is spinning like crazy too!'

data.name: ID_Sword_Mage_Stardust
data.value: 'The glittering dust vanishes instantly when it lands.'

data.name: ID_Head_Chains_DarkGhostSkeleton
data.value: Silent moonlight, in fades of grey, Spoken memories, that always stay, Whisper sweetly, in words so clear, But only of sorrow, pain and fear..

data.name: ID_Potion_Buff_SchottlanderFish
data.value: 'This drink is like a rush on a horse and then a really loooooooong fall.'

data.name: IUE_Schottlander
data.value: On Use: {0} for {1} seconds and then {2} for {3} seconds.

data.name: ID_Sword_HyruleBroad
data.value: 'The finest metal in all of Hyrule. Trust me.' - Tingle

data.name: ID_Ring_WeakMind
data.value: 'You should know that it is not the mind that is weak; but the ring itself.'

data.name: ID_Belt_Mana
data.value: 'Mana is leaking out of it. How sticky!'

data.name: ID_Gloves_GoronMage
data.value: 'Even the most untalented individual can learn to be a master with enough training.'

data.name: ID_Belt_Wizard
data.value: 'I'd say that us manipulating nature as we wish is fully justified.'

data.name: ID_Armor_Robe_GoronWizard
data.value: 'The vacuum is actually a highly dense structure.'

data.name: ID_Head_WizardDark
data.value: 'All what I say is wrong. Is it?'

data.name: ID_Necklace_UndeadHunter
data.value: 'If you trust the legends then most of these skeletons here actually have been undead hunters before..'

data.name: IUE_SpawnRandomGemMinLevelXMaxLevelY
data.value: On Use: Randomly spawns a gem. (level {0} to {1}).

data.name: IUE_SpawnRandomItem
data.value: On Use: Randomly spawns an item.

data.name: IUE_SpawnRandomItemMinLevelXMaxLevelY
data.value: On Use: Randomly spawns an item. (level {0} to {1}).

data.name: ID_Staff_DirectedEnergy
data.value: 'The energy is in proportion to the resistance it meets.'

data.name: ID_Quest_TeleportStone_RouteOfDin_Boss
data.value: As you touch the stone a voice speaks to you: "I am awaiting you. You are nothing."

data.name: ID_Key_RouteOfDin_SShaped
data.value: 'The S-shape of this key seems to remind you of something ..'

data.name: ID_Necklace_DemonRogue
data.value: 'If you wear that necklace for too long then I assure you that it will corrupt you. And then not even your best friends will be safe from you. Do you want that?'

data.name: ID_Ring_CriticalMass
data.value: 'We don't know why those rings have such a broad amount of different magical properties.'

data.name: ID_Shield_Quiver_Chicken
data.value: 'Hurting those poor chickens is just cruel.'

data.name: ID_Weapon_Dagger_Crystal
data.value: 'No, it is really not meant for stabbing.'

data.name: ID_Relic_MysticalShell
data.value: 'This is not an ordinary shell, but something more..'

data.name: ID_Gloves_DeathChicken
data.value: 'Every time a chicken dies ... .. worms! Waaaaaah.'

data.name: ID_Cloak_ChickenManteau
data.value: 'When I see a bird that walks like a duck and swims like a duck and quacks like a duck, then I call that bird a duck. Oh wait.. damn!'

data.name: ID_Misc_Triforce_Small
data.value: The three great goddesses, their labors completed, departed for the heavens. And golden sacred triangles remained at the point where the goddesses left the world.

data.name: ID_Key_Crystal_Shimmering
data.value: 'It's a key... which doesn't look like a a key.'

data.name: ID_Ring_SilverRuby
data.value: 'The power of the demon world.. intriguing.'

data.name: ID_Ring_SilverSapphire
data.value: 'To aquire the true power Light and Darkness must be in equilibrium.'

data.name: ID_Misc_MusicCross
data.value: Play the Song of the Cross to teleport.

data.name: IUE_SaveTeleportPosition
data.value: On Use: Stores the current location. Won't work everywhere.

data.name: ID_Misc_Potion_VirginBlood
data.value: 'You know what? I respect women! I love women! I respect them so much that I completely stay away from them and instead ..!'

data.name: ID_Armor_Robe_Scale
data.value: 'The perfectly woven scales in this garment appear to collect natural light, providing a boost in magical ability to the wearer.'

data.name: ID_Relic_Crest_BloodRuby
data.value: 'That ruby could be your ticket out of this God forsaken continent.'

data.name: ID_Potion_ShadowProt_Small
data.value: 'The essence of evil, captured in a simple bottle.'

data.name: ID_Relic_NanoHamster
data.value: The girl lost this kernel in a furious attack by an illogical zen. Also adds: +100 Cuteness Rating

data.name: ID_Misc_Chains_Loose
data.value: These tools have worn loose as a result from their countless uses. The surface is rugged, and... a little oily?

data.name: ID_Relic_FireBone
data.value: 'Sockets and gems are the best friends' - Guild Alchemist

data.name: ID_Armor_FullPlate_Scale
data.value: Full body armor made from scale-iron. Heavy.

data.name: ID_SongScroll_HomeTeleportation
data.value: Up.. Down.. Up.. Up.. Left.. Right..

data.name: IN_SongScroll_HomeTeleportation
data.value: Song Scroll of the Lament of Hyrule

data.name: ID_Sword_HyruleLight
data.value: Stick them with the pointy end.

data.name: ID_Sword_Protector_Hyrule
data.value: Honor is the courage to stand for the truth, against any odds.

data.name: ID_Key_Locket_Triforce
data.value: Whisper-whisper: 'Use me to unlock a secret..'

data.name: ID_Misc_Herb_Sticky
data.value: A smell-resistant crafter can use it as glue by grinding it down.

data.name: ID_Misc_Leaf_Sharp
data.value: A very sharp leaf. Don't cut yourself.
